titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, Student Affairs, 1963-present UPG.RG.38
titlestmt.author: James T. Vikartosky.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:42:07 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, Student Affairs
did.abstract: Administrative Records of the Student Affairs of the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, 1963-present.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access to Series I and Series VIII to UPG Administrative personnel only.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: All rights reserved. University of Pittsburgh.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Transferred from Student Services to the UPG Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg, Student Affairs, 1963-present, UPG.RG.38, UPG Archives, University of Pittsburgh Library System.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Frank Zabrosky in 2019.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Enrolled Students, First Year Student Convocation, Housing, Orientation, Resident Handbook, See UPG, Student Handbook, Student Directory, Student Health Plan, Student Information Fair, Student Organizations, Student Publications, UPG Resident Directory

otherfindaid.head: See Also
otherfindaid.p: See also: UPG.RG.52 Visual Images. Prints. Student Activities Fair
Student Publications are filed in UPG.RG.50 Publications Series: Serials
UPG Resident Directory from Fall 2006, See: UPG.RG.38 Series: Enrolled Students [University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg]
See also: UPG.RG.02.4 Ser.: Resource File for "We Made No Small Plans: A Memoir".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: SEE UPG Supporting & Enhancing Your Education At UPG.
First issued, September, 1998. [Magazine specifically designed for freshmen and incoming students by students. Funded by the Office for Student Affairs]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: 2000-2001 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2001-2002 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2002-2003 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2003-2004 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2004-2005 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2005-2006 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2006-2007 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2007-2008 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)
2008-2009 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook)

2009-2010 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook) [Note: With academic year 2009/10, the Student Handbook available in an electronic edition. UPG Archives has print version of the electronic edition.]
2010-2011 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook) [Print version of electronic edition.]
2018-2019 (includes Student Code of Conduct & Judicial Procedures and Resident Handbook) [Print version of electronic edition.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: Ltr. dtd. 10/8/82 to Donald L. Stohl, Ex. Sec., Kappa Delta Rho, Inc. outlining some guiding principles and includes a "Resolution Against Hazing". [Ltr. found within some faculty files of Dr. Donald Gibson. faz 5/21/15.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: [Rosters] 1999/2000 (?), 2000/2001 Brochure. "Guide to Student Organizations" [undtd] Pamphlet. "Guide of Organizations. GO! University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg" 26 p. [Fall, 2007] [Pamphlet] "SGA Club Handbook" (revised August 2007) 12 p. [Listing of student organizations appearing on the University of Pittsburgh Greensburg Webpage: Student Life. Getting Involved. [2/21/2017]] [faz]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Notes
scopecontent.p: As of 2017 the following organizations either existed or had existed on the UPG campus:
Accounting Club See also: Pitt-Greensburg Accounting/Business Club
Alpha Alpha Delta (UPG Chapter of Sigma Tau Delta) [International English Honor Society] SEE: Sigma Tau Delta
Alpha Epsilon Kappa (UPG Chapter of Pi Sigma Alpha)
Alpha Phi Sigma (Criminal Justice Honor Society)
Alpha Phi Sigma [National Honor Society in Criminal Justice]
Beta Beta Beta (National Honor Soc. in Biology). UPG Chapter
Black Cultural Society [UPG Black Cultural Society]
Chi Alpha Sigma (National College Athlete Honor Society). UPG Chapter
Children's Literature Club [ UPG Children's Literature Club]
Communication Honor Society See: Lambda Pi Eta
Creative Writing Club [organized 2017] [Creative and Professional Writing Majors]
Criminal Justice Society [Criminal Justice Club; Upsilon Psi Gamma]
Delta Psi Omega [National Theatre Honor Society]
Drama Club SEE: RG52 Subject Files. Ser.: UPG Players; RG52 Ser.: UPG Performance Collective
Engineering Society: Engineering Club (For photo, See: qRG60 Prints.)
Environmental and Ecology Club [Environmental Society; Environmental Club]
Gay and Lesbian Outreach Coalition (GLOC) See also: Allies/LGBT
Gay/Straight Alliance See: Pitt-Greensburg Gay/Straight Alliance
German Society of the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg
Humanities Society of the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg
Ice Hockey Club [Pitt-Greensburg Ice Hockey team; Bobcat Ice Hockey Team]
Judicial Board, University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg
Men Against Sexual Violence [MASV] See: RG52 Men Against Sexual Violence [MASV]
NAGPODP (Non Affiliated Group Pondering Ongoing Diversifying Problems)
Phi Eta Sigma [National Freshman Honor Society]. UPG Chapter.
Phi Kappa Phi [National Seniors Honor Society] Chapter 286 [UPG Chapter]
Pi Gamma Mu [National Honor Society in Social Science]
Pi Mu Epsilon [National Mathematics Honor Society]
Pi Sigma Alpha [National Political Science Honor Society]
Pitt Greensburg Student Alumni Association (SAA) See: Student Alumni Association (SAA)
Pitt Greensburg Alumni Association (SAA) See: Student Alumni Association (SAA)
Psi Chi (National Honor Society in Psychology)
Rainbow Coalition of UPG [reactivated under new name: Allies]
SALUTE Veterans Honor Society [2019- ] See RG52 Ser.: SALUTE Veterans Honor Society
Senior Honor Society [University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg Senior Honor Society] SEE: Phi Kappa Phi. Chapter 286.
Sigma Alpha Lambda SEE: Society of Success [UPG]
Sigma Tau Delta [International English Honor Society]
Society of Success [UPG] [Society of Leadership and Success] [Sigma Alpha Lambda]
Student Alumni Association (SAA) [Pitt Greensburg Student Alumni Association (SAA)]
Student Alumni Association (SAA) [Pitt Greensburg Student Alumni Association (SAA)]
Student Athlete Advisory Council [Student Athlete Advisory Committee]
Students PSEA [Students Pa. State Education Association] [UPG Chapter]
Students for Peace and Justice [Students for Peace]
UPG Children's Literature Club See: Children's Literature Club
UPG Collegiate Chorale See RG52 Subject Files--UPG Collegiate Chorale
UPG Concert Band See RG52 Subject Files--UPG Concert Band
UPG Performance Collective SEE RG52 Subject Files. Ser.: UPG Performance Collective
Upsilon Psi Gamma Chapter of the Lambda Alpha Epsilon Criminal Justice Assoc.[Criminal Justice Society]
Village Senate See: Delta Eta Beta

The researcher should consult the various editions of the Student Handbook for information on the student organizations which are listed above. In addition, the UPG Archives has information in a separate file on the following organizations:
Alpha Alpha Delta SEE: Sigma Tau Delta
Beta Beta Beta (National Honor Society in Biology). UPG Chapter
Black Cultural Society [UPG Black Cultural Society]
Chi Alpha Sigma (National College Athlete Honor Soc.) UPG Chapter
Children's Literature Club [UPG Children's Literature Club]
Creative Writing Club [organized 2017] [Creative and Professional Writing Majors]
Delta Psi Omega [National Theatre Honor Society]
Drama Club SEE: RG52 Ser.: UPG Players; RG52 Ser.: UPG Performance Collective
Environmental and Ecology Club [Environmental Society; Environmental Club]
Gay/Straight Alliance See: Pitt-Greensburg Gay/Straight Alliance See also: Allies/LGBT
Humanities Society of the University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg
Ice Hockey Club [Pitt-Greensburg Ice Hockey team; Bobcat Ice Hockey Team]
Judicial Board, University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg
NAGPODP (Non Affiliated Group Pondering Ongoing Diversifying Problems)
Phi Eta Sigma [National Freshman Honor Society]. UPG Chapter.
Phi Kappa Phi [National Seniors Honor Society] Chapter 286 [UPG Chapter]
Pi Sigma Alpha [National Political Science Honor Society]
Pre Law Society See: UPG.RG.38 Student Affairs. Series: Student Organizations for poster calendar, "The Pre Law Society presents...Women of UPG 1993".
Rainbow Coalition of UPG [reactivated under the name: Allies]
Senior Honor Society [University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg Senior Honor Society] SEE: Phi Kappa Phi. Chapter 286.
Sigma Alpha Lambda See: Society of Success [UPG]
Society of Success [UPG] [Society of Leadership and Success] [Sigma Alpha Lambda]
Student Athlete Advisory Council [Student Athlete Advisory Committee]
Student PSEA [Student Pa. State Education Association]
Students For Peace and Justice [Students for Peace]
University of Pittsburgh at Greensburg Senior Honor Society [Senior Honor Society] [est.2000 evolved in 2013 as Phi Kappa Phi Chapter 286.]
UPG Children's Literature Club See: Children's Literature Club
UPG Collegiate Chorale See RG52 Subject Files--UPG Collegiate Chorale
UPG Concert Band See RG52 Subject Files--UPG Concert Band
UPG Performance Collective SEE RG52 Subject Files. Ser.: UPG Performance Collective
UPG Players SEE: RG52 Ser.: UPG Players
Village Senate See: Delta Eta Beta
